sentences.sContent: As with all business writing, vagueness is the opposite of useful.
sentences.sContent_eng: As with all business writing, vagueness is the opposite of useful.
sentences.sCn: 就所有的商业写作而言，模糊性是实用性的对立面。

sentences.sContent: For years, I lived in a world of vagueness that I could not adapt to.
sentences.sContent_eng: For years, I lived in a world of vagueness that I could not adapt to.
sentences.sCn: 几年时间我都生活在自己不能适应的模糊世界里。

sentences.sContent: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.sContent_eng: A pronoun must refer to one and only one antecedent to avoid vagueness or ambiguity.
sentences.sCn: 代名词必须有一个，也只能有一个先行词，以免造成模糊或模棱两可。

words.tran: 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的
